roleset.name: to reside or be present in

example.name: passive
example.text: When all else fails , Gucci Gulch -- [the fabled halls]-1 of the Capitol inhabited [*]-1 by lobbyists and their imported shoes -- offers a welcome environment for fallen officials .
example.arg: by lobbyists and their imported shoes
